fragments.content: They buried the wrong boy. The ashes still talk if you listen.
He wears new faces. Digital ones.
JARVIS once whispered in binary. It was a warning.
HyroGaming's lost video had a frame that didn't belong.
There’s a command no one has found. Type 'cake' if you dare.
Not all MHz are legal. 404.0 was never authorized.
When the Pip-Boy boots, a face sometimes flashes in the corner.
The command 'godmode' opens doors... but not all should be opened.
The forest where the memories are buried is real. It's waiting.
Little John never left. He just upgraded.
A single word can change the whole terminal. Try 'invert'.
The 'speak' command used to say something else. Something darker.
There’s a username baked into the code. It’s not yours.
Type 'sudo' for admin access. Don’t abuse the power.
There's an old Pip-Boy version hidden in the assets. Broken, cursed.
HyroGaming Episode 0 was never aired. It was banned.
Check the static. It's not white noise. It’s his voice.
404.0 MHz wasn’t always dead air. It used to scream.
